nodes.text: Lithio Motti was a man who lived at some point during the last centuries of the Galactic Republic.

Lithio was a member of the Motti family and he married an heiress from the Praji family, to gain some capital to start a Megonite moss mining operation on Phelarion. His descendants continued to control the operation for centuries afterward and one of them, Thalassa Motti, married into the Tarkin family.
